title: Souvlaki
ingredients: 3 pounds pork tenderloin, cut into 1 inch cubes
2 medium yellow onions, cut into 1 inch pieces
2 medium green bell peppers, cut into 1 inch pieces
method: Step 2: Mix oil, soy sauce, lemon juice, garlic, and oregano together in a large glass bowl.
Step 3: Add pork, onions, and bell peppers, and stir until coated. Cover and refrigerate for 2 to 3 hours.
Step 4: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.
Step 5: Remove pork and vegetables from marinade and shake off excess; thread onto skewers. Discard remaining marinade.

Step 6: Cook on the preheated grill, turning frequently, until pork is no longer pink in the middle, 10 to 15 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 145 degrees F (63 degrees C).
Step 7: Nutrition data for this recipe includes the full amount of marinade ingredients. The actual amount consumed will vary.
